hazy.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: air that is hazy is not clear because there is a lot of smoke, dust, or mist in it
hazy.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: an idea, memory etc that is hazy is not clear or exact
hazy.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: My memories of the holiday are rather hazy.
She was a little hazy about the details.
